title: PM briefed on performance of ministries
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 24 (APP):Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday here held a meeting with Special Assistant for Establishment Muhammad Shehzad Arbab and received a briefing on a review on the performance agreements with different ministries.
The Prime Minister appreciated the efforts of Special Assistant Shehzad Arbab for making the performance of government institutions effective and transparent.
The Prime Minister will give awards to the ministries next week for showing best performance on the basis of the review report.
